scripts.dev:tauri: dotenv -- concurrently -k "npm -w @tiny-chat/core-backend run dev" "node tools/wait-for-backend.js && npm -w @tiny-chat/apps-tauri run tauri dev"
scripts.dev:tauri:ios: dotenv -- concurrently -k "npm -w @tiny-chat/core-backend run dev -- --host" "node tools/wait-for-backend.js && npm -w @tiny-chat/apps-tauri run tauri ios dev -- --host"
scripts.dev:tauri:android: dotenv -- concurrently -k "npm -w @tiny-chat/core-backend run dev -- --host" "node tools/wait-for-backend.js && npm -w @tiny-chat/apps-tauri run tauri android dev -- --host"
scripts.dev:web: dotenv -- concurrently -k "npm -w @tiny-chat/core-backend run dev" "node tools/wait-for-backend.js && npm -w @tiny-chat/apps-web run dev"

scripts.build:tauri:android: dotenv -- npm -w @tiny-chat/apps-tauri run tauri android build
